alert.note: Alert for Bottineau; McHenry; Rolette (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 22 at 1:41PM CDT until further notice by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Bismarck ND has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in North Dakota... Willow Creek near Willow City affecting McHenry, Rolette and Bottineau Counties. .Recent rainfall is making its way through the Willow Creek drainage system and is expected to produce minor flooding, mainly near Willow City. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Willow Creek near Willow City. * WHEN...From this afternoon until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 1442.0 feet, high water will create more nuisance type flooding over lowland areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:00 PM CDT Sunday the stage was 1441.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Monday. It could then remain in minor flood stage for the foreseeable future. - Flood stage is 1442.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
